title: Fall Fest
description: Every Saturday from August to November, the North Florida Fair Grounds hosts a Fall Fest. The event features a farmers market, live music, and a petting zoo. The event is free to the public .

title: Family Fun Day
description: Hosted by Local Farm, explore the farm and enjoy a free amature rodeo show. The event is free to the public.

title: Tallahassee Farmers Market
description: Come join us and other local vendors downtown Tallahassee! Our selection of produce is limited to what is in season.

title: Summer Squash Festival
description: Annual Summer Festival, live music, food, and games.

title: Junior Farmers of America
description: For children ages 5-12, learn about farming and agriculture in small group settings. Sign-up before November 1st.

title: Valentines Day Cooking Class
description: Limited class size, learn how to cook a romantic dinner for two using fresh ingredients from the farm. $50 per person.
